content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Iron Smelting Setup at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- First furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Second furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Both furnaces are being used for smelting iron ore into iron plates, loaded with coal and iron ore.

ERROR TIPS
No errors have occurred in the execution steps so far. The agent has successfully:
- Located resources
- Harvested resources
- Crafted items
- Placed furnaces correctly
- Added fuel and materials to furnaces
- Extracted products from furnaces

The agent is demonstrating proper execution of:
- Resource gathering
- Structure placement
- Production management
- Inventory handling
